languages.text: "Бедняга так перепуган... я, пожалуй, удалюсь, а вместо себя разговаривать оставлю Маражая. Вы ведь знакомы с моим спутником из рода друкари?"
"The poor soul is so frightened... perhaps I should leave and let Marazhai speak in my place. You are familiar with my Drukhari companion, aren't you?"
languages.original_text: "Бедняга так перепуган... я, пожалуй, удалюсь, а вместо себя разговаривать оставлю Маражая. Вы ведь знакомы с моим спутником из рода друкари?"

traits.locale_text: "The poor soul is so frightened... perhaps I should leave and let Marazhai speak in my place. You are acquainted with my Drukhari companion, are you not?"
"The poor soul is so frightened... perhaps I should leave and let Marazhai speak in my place. You are acquainted with my Drukhari companion, are you not?"
"The poor soul is so frightened... perhaps I should leave and let Marazhai speak in my place. You are familiar with my Drukhari companion, aren't you?"
"The poor soul is so frightened... perhaps I should leave and let Marazhai speak in my place. You are familiar with my Drukhari companion, aren't you?"
"The poor soul is so frightened... perhaps I should leave and let Marazhai speak in my place. You are familiar with my Drukhari companion, aren't you?"
"The poor soul is so frightened... perhaps I should leave and let Marazhai speak in my place. You are familiar with my Drukhari companion, aren't you?"

languages.text: 「哀れな魂がひどく怯えている…私はここを離れるべきだろう。代わりにマラズハイと話してもらおう。我がデュカーリの仲間なら、馴染みがあるだろう？」
languages.original_text: "The poor soul is so frightened... perhaps I should leave and let Marazhai speak in my place. You are familiar with my Drukhari companion, aren't you?"

traits.locale_text: 「哀れな魂がひどく怯えている…私はここを離れるべきだろう。代わりにマラズハイと話してもらおう。我がデュカーリの仲間なら、馴染みがあるだろう？」

languages.text: “这个可怜的孩子真是吓坏了……或许我应该让玛拉斋和你聊聊。就是我身边的这位黑暗灵族，想必你也认识吧？”
languages.original_text: "The poor soul is so frightened... perhaps I should leave and let Marazhai speak in my place. You are familiar with my Drukhari companion, aren't you?"

traits.locale_text: “这个可怜的孩子真是吓坏了……或许我应该让玛拉斋和你聊聊。就是我身边的这位黑暗灵族，想必你也认识吧？”

languages.text: « Le pauvre petit est mort de peur... Je ferais peut-être mieux partir et laisser Marazhai parler à ma place. Vous connaissez déjà mon compagnon Drukhari, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "The poor soul is so frightened... perhaps I should leave and let Marazhai speak in my place. You are familiar with my Drukhari companion, aren't you?"

traits.locale_text: « Le pauvre petit est mort de peur... Je ferais peut-être mieux partir et laisser Marazhai parler à ma place. Vous connaissez déjà mon compagnon Drukhari, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: «El miedo le puede... Quizás debería irme y dejar que Marazhai hable en mi lugar. Conoce a mi acompañante Drukhari, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "The poor soul is so frightened... perhaps I should leave and let Marazhai speak in my place. You are familiar with my Drukhari companion, aren't you?"

traits.locale_text: «El miedo le puede... Quizás debería irme y dejar que Marazhai hable en mi lugar. Conoce a mi acompañante Drukhari, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: "Die arme Seele ist derart verängstigt ... Vielleicht sollte ich gehen und Marazhai für mich sprechen lassen. Ihr kennt doch meinen Drukhari-Gefährten, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "The poor soul is so frightened... perhaps I should leave and let Marazhai speak in my place. You are familiar with my Drukhari companion, aren't you?"

traits.locale_text: "Die arme Seele ist derart verängstigt ... Vielleicht sollte ich gehen und Marazhai für mich sprechen lassen. Ihr kennt doch meinen Drukhari-Gefährten, nicht wahr?"

languages.text: "Yazık, çocukcağızın ödü patlıyor... Belki benim yerime Marazhai konuşsa daha iyi olur. Drukhari yoldaşımla tanışmıştın, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "The poor soul is so frightened... perhaps I should leave and let Marazhai speak in my place. You are familiar with my Drukhari companion, aren't you?"

traits.locale_text: "Yazık yahu, ödü patlıyor... Belki benim yerime Marazhai konuşsa daha iyi olur. Drukhari yoldaşımla tanışmıştın, değil mi?"
